title: Why do you lose LP when someone is AFK?
body:
I understand that there may be some circumstances where you ask someone to leave the game to avoid a loss and that you could even win 5v4 but I've been DEMOTED off games where someone was registered as AFK and was also super toxic, he was gone for 15 minutes of the game....

I just got a loss at 0 LP and luckily didn't get demoted again..(freshly into G3)...I think he lost connection but we were winning and then he disc and we spent 10 mins gradually losing our lead until we lost(we may have been behind the whole time but could have won with a 5th and couldn't win as 4 with the group of people we had)

Does the LP have to be taken from someone to win it? Because I feel the odd time someone disc it is either a heavy heavy troll, someone who lost their internet or computer crash both of which nobody should lose LP over. Count it as a loss but take 0 LP imo....I've had 2 x AFK like their name was X out...lose 17LP like why? If you're in a duo you don't have disc protection if the person leaving is in the duo...that would avoid any colluding or cheating with it..... 

The system is too dry and robotic to be friendly to humans..
